title: Im so fucking tired of being at 100% for 15 minutes whilst patching.
body:
This fucking client. 
It's been a year since you shoved an unfinished laggy product up our asses and forced us to upgrade to it.
It's been a year and you still didn't fix the low priority queue bugs.
It's been a year and images still become black boxes when i switch to my browser and then back to client.
It's been a year and you couldn't fix the patching thing.
It's been a year and the client still doesn't have a proper 'low spec' mode, but a placebo thing that turns off a few animations (i don't actually need a low spec mode, but there are a lot of people who i'm sure do need it).
It's been a year and you still didn't figure out how to fix the client's memory leak.

For the love of god, please fix the client. You literally ditched the old client for the new one to solve some problems that old client had (outdated Adobe Air stuff or idk), but the new client caused even more problems. I was in the alpha client plan, and even then people have reported terrible performance, bugs and a lot of bloat which is present today. Despite all that, you just shrug those complaints off with "we'll continue to optimize it", but literally what you did is add even more bloat to it.
I'm so surprised that such a gigantic company like you released something like this and not get criticized to oblivion. People have been complaining for a year and you guys couldn't sit there and just fix that.
